page.title: 10SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: { I am 10 years old and I go to St.Mary's Middle School,Puddletown. I am in the first year and I will describe a typical day for me. The bus comes for us at 8.30a.m. and it takes 20 minutes to travel about 3 miles.The bell rings at 9.00 and we go into our classrooms.Mr.Longridge calls the register and then we go to assembly.After assembly we have our first lesson which lasts 70 minutes.We have 15 minutes break at 10.40 followed by another lesson which ends at 12.05. Lunchtime lasts until 1.15.Some people buy lunches,others bring a packed lunch.We have afternoon lessons with a break at 2.30.School ends at 3.50.The lessons we have include Maths,English,Humanities,Science,Music ,P.E.,R.E.,Design and Computer work.
